select id, username, bank_account, is_active, profile_img from user
SELECT us.id, us.username, us.bank_account, us.is_active, us.profile_img FROM ( select u.user_id FROM usergroup u where u.group_id = #{id} ) T1 inner join `user` us on T1.user_id = us.id
